text: The Steve Harvey Show is an American television sitcom created by Winifred Hervey and directed by Stan Lathan that aired on The WB from August 25, 1996 to February 17, 2002, with a total of 122 half-hour episodes spanning six seasons. Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:2002 American television series endings Category:Television series by Sony Pictures Television Category:Television series by Universal Television Category:The WB sitcoms
title: The Steve Harvey Show
